channel.title: CVE Feed for SolarWinds -- Serv-U
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SolarWinds -- Serv-U

item.title: CVE-2024-45714|2024-10-16T07:26:04.406Z -- solarwinds -- serv-u
item.description: Application is vulnerable to Cross Site Scripting (XSS) an authenticated attacker with usersâ€™ permissions can modify a variable with a payload.

item.title: CVE-2024-45711|2024-10-16T07:27:22.001Z -- solarwinds -- serv-u
item.description: SolarWinds Serv-U is vulnerable to a directory traversal vulnerability where remote code execution is possible depending on privileges given to the authenticated user. This issue requires a user to be authenticated and this is present when software environment variables are abused. Authentication is required for this vulnerability

item.title: CVE-2024-28072|2024-07-24T17:45:43.053Z -- solarwinds -- serv-u
item.description: A highly privileged account can overwrite arbitrary files on the system with log output. The log file path tags were not sanitized properly.
